title: Missing persons cases 2012 to 2019
summary: Overall Number of cases has increased over the Year.
Number of cases is slightly increasing from 2012 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2015 and 2016.
The highest Number of cases, of value 229687.0 was reached at Year 2018
The lowest Number of cases, of value 120791.0 was reported at Year 2012
